headline: Lantheus Joins FIBRE Consortium with Pfizer, Lumina to Revolutionize Fibrotic Disease Treatment
summary: Lantheus Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:LNTH) is one of the most undervalued US stocks according to analysts. On June 20, Lantheus Holdings announced its participation in the newly launched FIBRE Consortium, which is a collaborative initiative with Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) and Lumina Pharmaceuticals. The consortium’s primary goal is to revolutionize the treatment of fibrotic diseases by using […]
